LanguageData.Campfire.label: campfire

LanguageData.PassiveCooler.label: passive cooler
LanguageData.PassiveCooler.description: A traditional unpowered cooler that works by water evaporation. Must be regularly replenished with wood. Not efficient enough to refrigerate food.
